item.title: J Douglas & the Noises Inside
item.description: J. Douglas & the Noises Inside (ex. The Others, japan::4) make the music, you do the dissociation; We meet in the middle somewhere. New EP matter to waves out now.

item.title: japan::4
item.description: downtempo synthpop for the dancer in us all.
